select PRODUCT_NO_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CHILD_PRICE, TOUR_START_DATE, TOUR_END_DATE, PRODUCT_VEHICLE, PRODUCT_VISIT_PLACE, PRODUCT_RESERVATION_NUMBER, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_CATEGORY) values(#{productNo}, #{productTitle}, #{productAdultPrice}, #{productChildPrice}, #{tourStartDate}, #{tourEndDate}, #{productVehicle}, #{productVisitPlace}, #{productReservationNumber}, #{productContent}, #{productCategory})

select MEDIA_NO_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO MEDIA (MEDIA_NO, PRODUCT_NO, MEDIA_DATA, MEDIA_TYPE) values(#{mediaNo}, #{productNo}, #{mediaData, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{mediaType})
mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_TITLE as productTitle, p.PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE as productAdultPrice, p.PRODUCT_CHILD_PRICE as productChildPrice, p.TOUR_START_DATE as tourStartDate, p.TOUR_END_DATE as tourEndDate, p.PRODUCT_VEHICLE as productVehicle, p.PRODUCT_VISIT_PLACE as productVisitPlace, p.PRODUCT_RESERVATION_NUMBER as productReservationNumber, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT as productContent, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY as productCategory FROM PRODUCT p ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_TITLE as productTitle, p.PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE as productAdultPrice, p.PRODUCT_CHILD_PRICE as productChildPrice, p.TOUR_START_DATE as tourStartDate, p.TOUR_END_DATE as tourEndDate, p.PRODUCT_VEHICLE as productVehicle, p.PRODUCT_VISIT_PLACE as productVisitPlace, p.PRODUCT_RESERVATION_NUMBER as productReservationNumber, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT as productContent, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY as productCategory, m.MEDIA_DATA as productMediaData, m.MEDIA_TYPE as productMediaType FROM PRODUCT p, MEDIA m WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_TITLE as productTitle, p.PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE as productAdultPrice, p.PRODUCT_CHILD_PRICE as productChildPrice, p.TOUR_START_DATE as tourStartDate, p.TOUR_END_DATE as tourEndDate, p.PRODUCT_VEHICLE as productVehicle, p.PRODUCT_VISIT_PLACE as productVisitPlace, p.PRODUCT_RESERVATION_NUMBER as productReservationNumber, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT as productContent, p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY as productCategory, m.MEDIA_DATA as productMediaData, m.MEDIA_TYPE as productMediaType FROM PRODUCT p, MEDIA m WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{productCategory}
SELECT MEDIA_NO as mediaNo, PRODUCT_NO as productNo, MEDIA_DATA as mediaData, MEDIA_TYPE as mediaType FROM MEDIA WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND ROWNUM=1
